sentences.en: In this dissertation, Cyclohexylbenzene ( CHB ) was used as a new overcharge protection additive in li - ion batteries.
sentences.cn: 本论文将环己基苯 ( Cyclohexylbenzene,CHB ) 作为一种新型电聚合过充保护添加剂应用到 锂 离子电池中.

sentences.en: It is nothing less than robbery for them to overcharge you in such way.
sentences.cn: 他们这样多收你的钱简直就是抢劫.

sentences.en: Make sure they don't overcharge you for the drinks.
sentences.cn: 注意别让他们多收饮料费。
毫无疑问,他们会卖得贵一些.

sentences.en: Not only did the restaurant overcharge me, but they hadn't served me well.
sentences.cn: 餐馆不仅要价太高, 而且对我的服务也不周到.

sentences.en: Rural medics get an average stipend of $65 a year, leading some to overcharge their patients.
sentences.cn: 这些医生每年仅得到65美元，这导致他们向病人高收费。

sentences.en: Rural medics get an average stipend of 65 dollars a year, leading some to overcharge their patients.
sentences.cn: 乡村医生每年的平均收入为65美元, 所以一些人对接诊者多收费.

sentences.en: Salesclerk: We never overcharge. It is a fair price to pay.
sentences.cn: 售货员: 我们从来不乱出价. 这是公道价钱.

sentences.en: Sometimes, they overcharge or don’t build those parts I have been paying for.
sentences.cn: 有时，他们收费过高或者要不给我修我一直在给钱的那些零部件。

sentences.en: The taxi - driver tried to overcharge her.
sentences.cn: 出租汽车司机想多收她的车钱.
他们过多地所要我们的伙食费.

sentences.en: They tried to overcharge me, but I didn't agree.
sentences.cn: 他们企图向我漫天要价, 但我没同意.

sentences.en: They were being overcharged for cheap beer.
sentences.cn: 他们买的是便宜的啤酒，却被收取了高价。

sentences.en: Under circumstance of high - temperature and overcharge, the battery will not dry out.
sentences.cn: 高温和过度充电的情况下, 电池不会变干.

sentences.en: Undercircumstance of high - temperature and overcharge, the battery will not dry out.
sentences.cn: 在高温和充电过度的条件下, 电池也不会干燥.

sentences.en: You can not possibly overcharge me.
sentences.cn: 你不能对我要价太高啊.

words.tran_cn: 对…之资本估价过高；过分投资于
[电]过度充电；[交]超载；装药过多

trans.tran_cn: 过度充电；超载；装药过多
对……索价过高；使……过度充电
trans.tran_en: to charge someone too much money for something

trans.tran_cn: 对…要价过高，向…乱讨价，使…过度充电，压倒
